meanings.sent1: After dinner, I will refry the leftover chicken for a snack.
meanings.sent2: It is common to refry French fries to make them extra crispy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally refried the bacon twice, and it turned out surprisingly tasty!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a chef's decision to refry the dish until it was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to amazing fried chicken was to refry it just before serving.
